EmailTemplate.name: NDCe.04-14-21 BNK NDCe Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: How Enterprise Platforms Make Digital Possible
EmailTemplate.textOnly: “Digital First” has become a cornerstone for strategy across many industries, and when financial institutions get it right, it’s impactful. That’s because you create a consistent, connected universe for your customers, no matter when, where or how they interact. And it isn’t a battle: both clicks and bricks are vitally important. It’s about choice. Seamless transactions. Immersing customers in an amazing brand experience. The key is having an enterprise platform. Listen to our webinar replay to learn what it could mean for {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}}. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
